Title: Full Hearts
Plot: Smash continues to go the extreme to improve his performance. Rumors begin to spread about Tim and Lyla's relationship. Julie and Matt attempt to go out on a date but it is cursed from the beginning.The Panthers are in much anticipation for their upcoming game against the Gatling High.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Jen Matthews, Tom Spry, Deneen Tyler, Henry Bryant, Megan Moser, Randy Stripling, James Powers, Whitney McCauley, Pastor Sid Johnson, Robert Parish, Blue Deckert, Brad Leland
